page.title: 12A Schoolday at Salterton
page.content: David is ten years old.Every morning his alarm clock wakes him up at twenty past six and his Mum gets his breakfast of Crunchy Nut cornflakes.He cycles half a mile to school and gets there at about 8.45am. In the morning his work is usually maths,English or poetry.His favourite subject is maths. He has a packed lunch consisting of a can of drink,salad cream and cheese sandwiches and chocolate sponge cake. After lunch he helps to put the chairs away in the School Hall. In the afternoon he usually does poetry,project or swimming. School finishes at 3.30 and David play with his friends until supper ,which is at 6.15.He likes to have spaghetti bolognaise.Bedtime is about 9.30.His dad is a dental mechanic and his mother works in a local shop.
